WITH empBase AS ( SELECT e.id , e.name , e.ssn , e.department_code , di.department_name , e.sub_department_code , di.child_name AS sub_department_name , e.position_code , pi.position_name , pi.is_manager , e.hire_date , e.resignation_date , ed.phone_number , ed.email , ed.file_idxs , ed.employee_status_code FROM t_employee AS e
LEFT JOIN t_employee_detail AS ed ON e.id = ed.id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT di.idx , di.department_code , ci.minor_name AS department_name , di.parent_code , di.child_code , di.child_name , di.rank_number , di.is_deleted , di.location_idx FROM t_department_info AS di LEFT JOIN t_commoncode_item AS ci ON ci.major_code = 'DEPARTMENT_CODE' AND di.department_code = ci.minor_code ) AS di ON e.department_code = di.department_code AND e.sub_department_code = di.child_code
LEFT JOIN t_position_info AS pi ON e.position_code = pi.position_code )

INSERT INTO t_approval VALUES (null -- idx(auto_increment) , #{approvalType} -- approval_type , #{progressStatus} -- progress_status , #{docNo} -- doc_no , #{title} -- title , #{content} -- content , #{recipeMasterIdx} -- recipe_master_idx , IFNULL(NULLIF(#{eventStartDate}, ''), NULL) -- event_start_date , IFNULL(NULLIF(#{eventEndDate}, ''), NULL) -- event_end_date , #{regId} -- drafter_id , #{draftDate} -- draft_date , #{dueDate} -- due_date , 'Y' -- is_deleted , #{regId} -- reg_id , now() -- reg_date , null -- mod_id(최초 등록시는 reg_id 만 넣고 update 시 mod_id 입력) , null -- mod_date )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE approval_type = VALUES(approval_type) , progress_status = VALUES(progress_status) , title = VALUES(title) , content = VALUES(content) , recipe_master_idx = VALUES(recipe_master_idx) , event_start_date = VALUES(event_start_date) , event_end_date = VALUES(event_end_date) , draft_date = VALUES(draft_date) , due_date = VALUES(due_date) , mod_id = #{modId} , mod_date = now()

INSERT INTO t_approval_items VALUES (null -- idx(auto_increment) , #{docNo} -- doc_no , #{approver1} -- approver1 , #{approver2} -- approver2 , #{approver3} -- approver3 , #{approver1Status} -- approver1_status , #{approver2Status} -- approver2_status , #{approver3Status} -- approver3_status , #{approver1Date} -- approver1_date , #{approver2Date} -- approver2_date , #{approver3Date} -- approver3_date , #{approver1Signature} -- approver1_signature , #{approver2Signature} -- approver2_signature , #{approver3Signature} -- approver3_signature , #{regId} -- reg_id , now() -- reg_date , null -- mod_id(최초 등록시는 reg_id 만 넣고 update 시 mod_id 입력) , null -- mod_date )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE approver1 = IF(approver1 IS NULL, VALUES(approver1), approver1) , approver2 = IF(approver2 IS NULL, VALUES(approver2), approver2) , approver3 = IF(approver3 IS NULL, VALUES(approver3), approver3) , approver1_status = IF(approver1_status IS NULL, VALUES(approver1_status), approver1_status) , approver2_status = IF(approver2_status IS NULL, VALUES(approver2_status), approver2_status) , approver3_status = IF(approver3_status IS NULL, VALUES(approver3_status), approver3_status) , approver1_date = IF(approver1_date IS NULL, VALUES(approver1_date), approver1_date) , approver2_date = IF(approver2_date IS NULL, VALUES(approver2_date), approver2_date) , approver3_date = IF(approver3_date IS NULL, VALUES(approver3_date), approver3_date) , approver1_signature = IF(approver1_signature IS NULL, VALUES(approver1_signature), approver1_signature) , approver2_signature = IF(approver2_signature IS NULL, VALUES(approver2_signature), approver2_signature) , approver3_signature = IF(approver3_signature IS NULL, VALUES(approver3_signature), approver3_signature) , mod_id = #{modId} , mod_date = now()

SELECT
, CONCAT(rm.name, '(ver.', rm.version, ')') AS recipeMasterName -- 수정페이지에서 보여주려고 , emp1.name AS approver1Name , emp2.name AS approver2Name , emp3.name AS approver3Name FROM empBase AS e
JOIN t_approval a ON e.id = a.drafter_id
LEFT JOIN t_approval_items ai ON ai.doc_no = a.doc_no
LEFT JOIN t_employee emp1 ON ai.approver1 = emp1.id
LEFT JOIN t_employee emp2 ON ai.approver2 = emp2.id
LEFT JOIN t_employee emp3 ON ai.approver3 = emp3.id
LEFT JOIN t_recipe_master rm ON a.recipe_master_idx = rm.idx
WHERE a.doc_no = #{docNo}

SELECT
, ci1.minor_name AS progressName , ci2.minor_name AS approvalTypeName FROM empBase e
JOIN t_approval a ON e.id = a.drafter_id
LEFT JOIN t_approval_items ai ON ai.doc_no = a.doc_no
JOIN t_commoncode_item ci1 ON a.progress_status = ci1.minor_code AND ci1.major_code = 'PROGRESS_STATUS'
JOIN t_commoncode_item ci2 ON a.approval_type = ci2.minor_code AND ci2.major_code = 'APPROVAL_TYPE'
1 = 1
AND a.drafter_id = #{memberId}
AND ( (a.drafter_id = #{memberId} AND a.progress_status = '2') OR (ai.approver1 = #{memberId} AND ai.approver1_status IS NULL AND a.progress_status = '1') OR (ai.approver2 = #{memberId} AND ai.approver2_status IS NULL AND ai.approver1_status = '3') OR (ai.approver3 = #{memberId} AND ai.approver3_status IS NULL AND ( (ai.approver2 IS NOT NULL AND ai.approver2_status = '3') OR (ai.approver2 IS NULL AND ai.approver1_status = '3') )) )
AND ( (ai.approver1 = #{memberId} AND ai.approver1_status IN ('3', '4')) OR (ai.approver2 = #{memberId} AND ai.approver2_status IN ('3', '4')) OR (ai.approver3 = #{memberId} AND ai.approver3_status IN ('3', '4')) ) AND a.progress_status != '1'
AND 1 = 1
ORDER BY draft_date DESC
